```{r}
#loading the tidyverse
library('tidyverse')
```


```{r}
#loading the file
conflicts <- read.csv('Yemen_2011.csv')
```

```{r}
#group conflicts by type of violence
conflicts_grouped <- conflicts %>%
  group_by(type.of.violence)
```

```{r}
#find the mean per violence type
conflicts_grouped_types <- conflicts_grouped %>%
summarise(average_types = mean(amount.of.deaths..best.))
```

```{r}
#plotting mean deaths per violence type 
ggplot(data = conflicts_grouped_types) + geom_col(mapping = aes(x = type.of.violence, y = average_types)) + xlab("violence type") + ylab("average amount of deaths") + ggtitle("Average amount of deaths per violence type")
```
